/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered across the street, indicating a busy time of day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue sky and the varied hues of the buildings.
